column1: Kata Robata////Atmosphere: casual decor but upscale vibe.  Always a crowded mix of foodies
column6: but do come if you are padded or feel like you can spurge.  It's quite pricey indeed. Good place to impress your date
column7: but not quiet enough for business or serious discussion
column8: because the tables are seated very close that you can hear next table's conversation.
